name: Severe Turbulence
description:
Avoid rocks by attempting to control a plane using its change in acceleration, to compete on a multiplayer scoreboard! Luckily, you can use your dash (obtained by collecting the blue circles) to dash through rocks and try to control your speed!

use WASD to move, when you have at least one dash, clicking your mouse will dash you towards your cursor.

This game was also made by eptgen, if you want more of the music in the game, its here! https://soundcloud.com/eptgen
